entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Waskaganish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:58 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -30.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Waskaganish Airport 6:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -30.6°C
Pressure: 102.9 kPa
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -44
Dewpoint: -34.8°C
Wind: W 22 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 35. Wind chill near minus 45. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
